alert.note: Alert for Central Black Hills; Custer Co Plains; Haakon; Hermosa Foothills; Northern Black Hills; Northern Jackson; Northern Meade Co Plains; Northern Oglala Lakota; Pennington Co Plains; Rapid City; Southern Jackson; Southern Meade Co Plains; Southern Oglala Lakota; Ziebach (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 05 at 3:47PM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...GUSTY SHOWERS WILL IMPACT HAAKON...SOUTHWESTERN ZIEBACH...EASTERN MEADE...EASTERN CUSTER...NORTHERN OGLALA LAKOTA...WESTERN JACKSON AND PENNINGTON COUNTIES THROUGH 445 PM MST... At 346 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking gusty showers along a line extending from 8 miles north of Marcus to 3 miles northwest of Wicksville to Sheridan Lake. Movement was southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Rapid City, Hill City, Philip, Kadoka, Rapid Valley, southern Ellsworth Air Force Base, Box Elder, Wall, Wanblee, Potato Creek, New Underwood, Hermosa, Keystone, Milesville, Hisega, Interior, Fairburn, Wasta, Scenic, and Plainview. This includes Interstate 90 in South Dakota between Mile Markers 58 and 156. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
